title: Breakingviews TV: Boeing/Brazil
text:
Breakingviews TV: Boeing/Brazil 12:40pm EST - 03:40 
Tom Buerkle and Richard Beales discuss Boeing’s idea of owning up to 90 percent of Brazil-based Embraer’s commercial aircraft business, as reported locally, and what it means for the aerospace giant’s rivalry with Airbus.   
Tom Buerkle and Richard Beales discuss Boeing’s idea of owning up to 90 percent of Brazil-based Embraer’s commercial aircraft business, as reported locally, and what it means for the aerospace giant’s rivalry with Airbus.  //reut.rs/2BIvI01
